name: storage
readme:
# storage [![NPM version](https://badge.fury.io/js/storage.svg)](http://badge.fury.io/js/storage)

> Basic object store for node.js

## Install
## Install with [npm](npmjs.org)

```bash
npm i storage --save
```

## Run tests

```bash
npm test
```

## Usage

```js
var storage = require('storage');
```
